original_text: But he did not make himself humble and turn back to the Lord, as his father Manasseh had done. Instead, Amon became guilty of even more sins.
korean_text: 이 아몬이 그의 아버지 므낫세가 스스로 겸손함 같이 여호와 앞에서 스스로 겸손하지 아니하고 더욱 범죄하더니

sentences.original_text: But he did not make himself humble
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 자신을 겸손하게 하지 않았고

sentences.original_text: and turn back to the Lord
as his father Manasseh had done
